sn47.5:1.3: “‘akusalarasi’ti, bhikkhave, vadamano panca nivarane samma vadamano vadeyya.
sn47.5:1.4: Kevalo hayam, bhikkhave, akusalarasi, yadidam—panca nivarana.
sn47.5:1.7: ‘Akusalarasi’ti, bhikkhave, vadamano ime panca nivarane samma vadamano vadeyya.
sn47.5:1.8: Kevalo hayam, bhikkhave, akusalarasi, yadidam—panca nivarana.
sn47.5:2.1: ‘Kusalarasi’ti, bhikkhave, vadamano cattaro satipatthane samma vadamano vadeyya.
sn47.5:2.2: Kevalo hayam, bhikkhave, kusalarasi, yadidam—cattaro satipatthana.
sn47.5:2.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.5:2.7: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.5:2.8: ‘Kusalarasi’ti, bhikkhave, vadamano ime cattaro satipatthane samma vadamano vadeyya.
sn47.5:2.9: Kevalo hayam, bhikkhave, kusalarasi, yadidam—cattaro satipatthana”ti.
